alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:19PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rusk and northeastern Chippewa Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 719 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sheldon, or 10 miles south of Ladysmith, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sheldon around 730 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern and west central Wisconsin.
